title: How to Buy a Cheap Used Tractor

tasks.task: Evaluate a used tractor for agricultural use.
subtasks: Check engine oil cleanliness and color.
Inspect tires for wear and fluid leaks.
Test steering responsiveness and power steering functionality.
Assess hydraulic system operation and check for leaks.
Evaluate power take-off (PTO) operation and shaft spline compatibility.
Consider implement compatibility for desired size and workload.
Assess financial viability and resale potential of a used tractor.
